pr_title: Adding support for Protobuf input format

timeline.bodyText:
extract this to a separate method, try to get it based on URI

file:<absolute_path>
classpath:
http://uri
This function can be used in multiple places.
timeline.author: kishoreg

replies.bodyText: What is the need for classpath?
replies.author: KKcorps

replies.bodyText: that allows them to provide relative path in the config
replies.author: kishoreg

timeline.bodyText: Can DynamicMessage and Builder instance also be reused across every call to next?
timeline.author: npawar

replies.bodyText: can you check with the help of your test? If they can be reused, make them class fields?
replies.author: npawar

replies.bodyText:
Done.  Temp DynamicMessage can be reused but reusing builder is not possible.
Moved the temp Dyanmic message to class variable.
replies.author: KKcorps
